Subjects: Christ, prayers to; prayers, to Christ
_description: A prayer to Jesus — twenty quatrains (abab)

Lincoln91.First Lines:
Ihesu criste Saynte Marye sonneThurgh whaym þis werlde was
                    worthily wroghte…
Lincoln91.Last Lines:
…That I may come vn to þi placeAnd wonne ay with the
                    stylle Amen
Lincoln91.Attributed Title:
Explicit Tractatus. Explicit. Amen. Thornton. Amen. (f.
                        211v)
